title: Imagine getting banned for someone else taking your lane but just give it a read for a good laugh
body:
This is what I was perma banned for boys leave a comment 
(Context I was toplane and my jg jax felt the need to take my lane from me for no reason i started typing at like around the 50 second mark when i realized he had teleport and no smite)
 Let the show begin below (unedited btw)

 [All]TryHardTNT: yo
    [All]TryHardTNT: wtf
    [All]TryHardTNT: i was toplane
    TryHardTNT: YRS
    [All]TryHardTNT: YES
    TryHardTNT: FUCKING YES
    TryHardTNT: like leave bro
    TryHardTNT: dude
    TryHardTNT: leave
    [All]TryHardTNT: 9x jax plz
    [All]TryHardTNT: would be appreciated
    TryHardTNT: who said im feeding
    [All]TryHardTNT: if i flame him i get banned
    [All]TryHardTNT: if i afk
    [All]TryHardTNT: i get banned
    [All]TryHardTNT: cough
    TryHardTNT: damn cait
    TryHardTNT: ouch
    TryHardTNT: you really have
    TryHardTNT: hurt
    TryHardTNT: my feelings
    TryHardTNT: and now
    TryHardTNT: i am sad
    TryHardTNT: and i will cry
    TryHardTNT: tonight
    TryHardTNT: very mean and bad person

    [All]TryHardTNT: and entire jg to farm with a counter strike

    [All]TryHardTNT: sure bro
    [All]TryHardTNT: nope
    [All]TryHardTNT: litterally staying quiet
    [All]TryHardTNT: i mean
    [All]TryHardTNT: if you want the same answer from a different person go ahead voli ask away
    [All]TryHardTNT: this is what low elo league looks like
    [All]TryHardTNT: who said im feeding on purpose
    [All]TryHardTNT: voli is a hard champion win against
    [All]TryHardTNT: THANK YOU
    [All]TryHardTNT: caitlyn
    [All]TryHardTNT: has the mentality of a 5 year old
    [All]TryHardTNT: and thats ok
    [All]TryHardTNT: im just saying
    [All]TryHardTNT: tf that made no sense to stick around that fight
    [All]TryHardTNT: voli has a bite that does 400+ damage
    [All]TryHardTNT: i was under 300 hp
    [All]TryHardTNT: you do the maths if i continued to fight
    [All]TryHardTNT: cant you let it slide
    [All]TryHardTNT: voli
    [All]TryHardTNT: omg
    [All]TryHardTNT: is that jax jg
    [All]TryHardTNT: who would have thought
    [All]TryHardTNT: how about you let me free farm voli
    [All]TryHardTNT: or you too mean for that
    [All]TryHardTNT: did i really ?
    [All]TryHardTNT: life is but an unfair misstress
    [All]TryHardTNT: jhin ?
    [All]TryHardTNT: look at rengar goo
    [All]TryHardTNT: me carry
    [All]TryHardTNT: me smart
    [All]TryHardTNT: and god
    [All]TryHardTNT: has been slain
    [All]TryHardTNT: trueeeee
    [All]TryHardTNT: ouch
    [All]TryHardTNT: Look at rengar carry
    [All]TryHardTNT: are you proud of me father volibear ?
    [All]TryHardTNT: :^)
    [All]TryHardTNT: i made pe paw hapy
    TryHardTNT: ?????
    [All]TryHardTNT: i just killed blitz ?
    [All]TryHardTNT: and im trolling ?
    [All]TryHardTNT: solo que
    [All]TryHardTNT: at its finest
    [All]TryHardTNT: OUT
    [All]TryHardTNT: PLAYED
    [All]TryHardTNT: you are trolling tf
    [All]TryHardTNT: TF SAID *too bad this rengar troll picked*
    [All]TryHardTNT: rengar toplane hasnt been this strong in years
    [All]TryHardTNT: I WAS FUCKING TOPLANE
    [All]TryHardTNT: tf
    [All]TryHardTNT: tel me
    [All]TryHardTNT: how can i be jg
    [All]TryHardTNT: when im autofilled protected and que'd up for top and mid
    [All]TryHardTNT: explain to me
    [All]TryHardTNT: tf
    [All]TryHardTNT: how
    [All]TryHardTNT: tell me o wise tf
    [All]TryHardTNT: uh
    [All]TryHardTNT: he has good winrate toplane tho
    [All]TryHardTNT: his jg winrate
    [All]TryHardTNT: is lower than his top winrate

    [All]TryHardTNT: and im still this close to cs with you


Post Game Lobby:
    TryHardTNT: they
    TryHardTNT: wanted to blame me
    TryHardTNT: for getting trolled
    TryHardTNT: they have the mentality of children
    TryHardTNT: mouse dc'ed
    TryHardTNT: THANK YOU LUX
    TryHardTNT: WISE
    TryHardTNT: WISE LUX
    TryHardTNT: wise beyond the stars
    TryHardTNT: and this tf
    TryHardTNT: blamed me
    TryHardTNT: idk
    TryHardTNT: i told him
    TryHardTNT: to afk
    TryHardTNT: but nah
    TryHardTNT: *i was jg ?*
    TryHardTNT: exact
    TryHardTNT: words
    TryHardTNT: true
    TryHardTNT: but im reporting cait
    TryHardTNT: for being a toxic
    TryHardTNT: dickhead
    TryHardTNT: report him plz
    TryHardTNT: tho
    TryHardTNT: life is hard
    TryHardTNT: jax trolled
    TryHardTNT: me
    TryHardTNT: soooooo hard
    TryHardTNT: and this tf said
    TryHardTNT: *report rengar for trolling*
    TryHardTNT: then lied and said

Does this deserve that perma banned
[](https://prnt.sc/o9c4l4)

replies.body:
You were calling for reports and talking in all chat, bringing the drama from your team to everyone. You also walked up well past your own minion wave and gave first blood (Not quite in tower range, but receiving all minion aggro and had no chance of winning the fight), then fought under Voli's tower to give him another kill. You also gave a 3rd kill under his tower. Pretty sure that was inting as well. Then you died a 4th time, albeit I don't think you had intentionally died, but Voli was way ahead of both top laners thanks to your actions. 

Sometimes they give chat logs when the message should have been for intentionally feeding, particularly when both behaviors occur in a game.

You also had a 2-week hiatus in your match history on 5/7/19, where you were likely told the next punishment would be a permaban.

I voted yay.

But hear dis nah he does alwayz run it down early game but at least he does be useful when his team needs him late game see dis is y I don’t understand fucks like u u watch the early game and think oh he is feeding let’s ban him he ALWAYZ plays top IN RANKED no buts no if’s y Jax find he self top lane for? Jax should’ve found himself in the jungle instead of being a bitch is tuh shoot all ah ullyuh [removed by moderation]

Jax should’ve found himself in the jungle instead of being a bitch is tuh shoot all ah ullyuh [removed by moderation]

You don't think feeding at any point deserves a punishment?

But the whole point is that it wasnt intentional tho 
If thats the point well then people should just be banned for having shit scores like my twisted fate from that very same game ?

I already answered as to how and why i died that 2nd death no help from jax as you can see if you would just open said eyes of yours and secondly you said i was bringing drama from my team to everyone so i should just stay quiet like if this is totally not taking my role and my farm ? while he isnt helping me with fights and i should be totally fine with this guy just trolling me ? thats so fair you should totally be in a game be it top,jg,mid,adc and someone just comes and take your role and your farm from you and you wouldnt say anything at all you would totally just be quiet and let them take all your stuff and be totally chill about in ranked right ? thats what you would do totally in that situation cause you would always do the best thing to avoid conflict even tho you are in the right ?
OOOOOOO WISE SAGE I MUST LEARN FROM YOU AND BANISH MY SINFUL WAYS O MIGHTY AND HOLY ONE ENLIGHTEN ME PLEASE DO GUIDE ME FROM THE DARKNESS THE DARK SIDE OF THE FORCE O GREAT KENOBI

> [{quoted}](name=TryHardTNT,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fj7k6NPp,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-07-02T07:54:27.932+0000)
>
> I already answered as to how and why i died that 2nd death no help from jax as you can see if you would just open said eyes of yours and secondly you said i was bringing drama from my team to everyone so i should just stay quiet like if this is totally not taking my role and my farm ? while he isnt helping me with fights and i should be totally fine with this guy just trolling me ? thats so fair you should totally be in a game be it top,jg,mid,adc and someone just comes and take your role and your farm from you and you wouldnt say anything at all you would totally just be quiet and let them take all your stuff and be totally chill about in ranked right ? thats what you would do totally in that situation cause you would always do the best thing to avoid conflict even tho you are in the right ?
> OOOOOOO WISE SAGE I MUST LEARN FROM YOU AND BANISH MY SINFUL WAYS O MIGHTY AND HOLY ONE ENLIGHTEN ME PLEASE DO GUIDE ME FROM THE DARKNESS THE DARK SIDE OF THE FORCE O GREAT KENOBI

Ya I've had someone take support from me. I picked someone who could midlane and support and wound up going mid. I've also played blind pick, where you have to make due with the teammates you have.  No one's happy with these types of players, but your choices were equally as bad if not worse in terms of where it put your team and their chances to win. Your chat also did nothing to help your team.
You do know there is a big difference between ranked trolling and blind pick trolling ?
You were banned because of what you did. Not because of what anyone else did.

I was banned because of what i did right ?
I was banned for :telling caitlyn (you have the mentality of a 5 year old)
I was banned for :saying caitlyn is a dickhead after she already left the post game lobby
I have seen people litterally run it down mid and be banned just cause they didnt say anything to anyone in chat but what i did was so terrible when there is litterally this guy who suffered 0 punishment for inting ranked just cause i picked *his* rengar[](https://prntscr.com/o9ekhh) https://prntscr.com/o9ekdi and this guy is still getting to play league with 0 ban but i get perma banned for calling someone a dickhead ?

Yes, that is what you were banned for.

What other people do affects their punishments. What you do affects your punishments.

A permaban for calling someone a dickhead alone ?
There is litterally people telling each other to *kill them selves* and they still get to play game ?

you weren't perma banned for calling someone a dickhead

you were _punished_ for that

that punishment escalated your account to a perma banned for showing a continuous **PATTERN** of negative or toxic behavior and lack of ability/interest in reforming your attitude all while ignoring the warnings you were given about the ToS you were breaking.

> [{quoted}](name=TryHardTNT,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fj7k6NPp,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-07-03T11:33:19.945+0000)
>
> A permaban for calling someone a dickhead alone ?
> There is litterally people telling each other to *kill them selves* and they still get to play game ?

That's actually a zero-tolerance phrase and will get you a 14-day or a perma, depending on your history.
Just like how when you got your 14-day, you were warned that any toxicity would result in a perma, which is what happened.
I'm sorry he took your lane, that sucks, but what you did didn't help and just made it miserable for the other three people on your team who didn't do anything.

I was not tabbed into the lobby after i selected my champion which is my fault i get that but its not like i was wrong for saying what i said litterally told him to leave (MY LANE) and to go to (HIS ROLE) but im the bad for telling someone they shouldnt be in my lane ?

wait wait should i really care that they feel bad about what they did ?
Its almost like he shouldnt reason conquinces for his actions
didnt even flame him tho

You weren't banned for someone else taking your lane. You were banned because you spent the entire 32-minute match and then the post-game lobby bickering with your team, calling them trolls, calling a teammate a "toxic dickhead," and so on. If you hadn't done that, you wouldn't be banned. Your very inability to grasp that your behavior - which is all that's considered when your account is reported - broke the rules is the reason you aren't being given any more opportunities to break the rules. And this is after a 14-day suspension just a couple months ago, where you were warned very clearly that the slightest misstep would cost you your account.

And even after that dire warning you're _still_ clogging up matches with bile and then acting self-righteous and innocent while blaming everyone but yourself for your behavior.

Permaban deserved.

You should read what i have replied to other simmilar comments and me calling my teammates (trolls) i still stand by because by using their own logic they would be trolls 
if you are doing bad they gonna call you a troll you start doing better than them you are still a troll lux was the only person from said match that was actually looking at it from my point of view 
I never flamed directly or to their face as you can read what i said before

> [{quoted}](name=TryHardTNT,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fj7k6NPp,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-07-02T07:35:25.908+0000)
>
> You should read what i have replied to other simmilar comments and me calling my teammates (trolls) i still stand by because by using their own logic they would be trolls 
> if you are doing bad they gonna call you a troll you start doing better than them you are still a troll lux was the only person from said match that was actually looking at it from my point of view 
> I never flamed directly or to their face as you can read what i said before

It doesn't matter whether it's true. It matters whether it's polite and conducive to a good match. If a teammate is trolling, spending the entire match screaming that they're a troll is harassment and doesn't help matters, in the same way that e.g. constantly announcing a teammate's poor score in chat is harassment and doesn't help matters even if it's factual. If you think a teammate is griefing, report them after the match.

Your punishment doesn't take into account what other people called you. Can you imagine if it did? Toxic players would get away with terrible behavior just because a teammate was even worse, and the least positive player on a team would be in danger of punishment just because everyone else's behavior was better. That would be kind of ridiculous, don't you think? That's why players are judged on whether their own behavior broke the rules.

You spent the entire match flaming and arguing, going on about how you were going to report your teammates, calling someone a "toxic dickhead," etc.

I'm not surprised in the slightest that you can't understand why you're banned. _That's why you're banned._ Riot has had enough of your behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fj7k6NPp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-07-02T06:56:29.114+0000)
>
> Permaban deserved.

Strongly disagree. One of the most unjust bans I've ever come across.
Those kids got wat they deserved to but uk

I looked into that match history and i saw you dying four times before ten minutes? what was going on in your mind for doing that? Oh jax isn't doing jungle and he is top lane with me. I'm gonna have to feed and cry about it to everyone? I said no just because the jax should have played his role if he was jungler, but i changed my mind. if anything you could have taken smite and played jungle forget about the lane and help the team. what Periscope said, "You also had a 2-week hiatus in your match history on 5/7/19, where you were likely told the next punishment would be a permaban." you had been reported before and banned for it.. maybe next time you create a account don't act like this and you wont get banned in the first place..

Aight pause the mouse (wireless) was acting up for the earlier parts of the game which is why i decided to switch out the batteries just to be sure and im sure when you watch the fights and them you can clearly see me using my abilities you know (atleast trying to get some damage off and im also sure you were seeing said jax not even attempting to help but was instead farming while he had stun and leap strike availble to him)

I'm not trying to put this as a negative statement. you could have changed roles before the game started and if you had battery issues you could have sat in base and changed them. like what everyone else is saying could have dodged at champ selection or do what i said and just put the smite on and play jungle. Negative talking doesn't change anything just makes things worse. We all have those players that want to do what they like... it tilts and makes it worse but you can play it off or just surrender. Just improve on attitude and try to be positive.

Fam i wasnt directly toxic at anyone chat besides in the post game lobby riot does not ban you for cursing in chat its when you curse at another player is when its bannable but a perma ban for saying *dickhead* you cant tell me thats not harsh expecially after i was making progress.
People would litterally troll ranked matches and feed purposefully and not get perma ban just cause they dont type in chat :/

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Pigeon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Fj7k6NPp,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2019-07-02T12:04:22.463+0000)
>
> See now is ppl like this tht get gun down in the streets....

dude you need to stop with this, it's nowhere near cool or edgy and you should be ashamed to write it.

Aight i can understand what you said about me going jg with smite i really do get that but i was not tabbed in after i locked in my champion so i couldnt see that jax took teleport  that i the reason why i didnt dodge or go jg and for the reason of my death i have already explained the early deaths i really only died 2 times badly the other times was cause of having two people in the lane and the was being pushed so voli would flip me under turret and like i said before you would look at said game properly this time you would also the jax not even attemping to help in form shape or fashion not to mention me being constantly flamed by said teammates which the most i said is (5 year old mentality) and this one at the post lobby (toxic dickhead) after everyone else had left if only i can show you what the enemies were saying about the topic you would think twice cause even the enemies were siding with me on what i was saying and was confused to as why the caitlyn was focused on defending the jax that trolled the match.
Ps.riot wont allow you to get what all players said during the match which is kinda of dumb which dosent put context in place 
I was actually making proggress in not being toxic went from honor level 0 to honor 0 check 2/3 which is very hard to do in the first place just saying

I cant see the chat in replay, So i saw the game info in your history and shows time stamps of what happen. other than that if they are talking to you negatively mute them and report them after the game. that's the best to do and for the jax that trolled you. just shrug it off since its game and you can hop on another if you had done this stuff. but you didn't and act negative. Its really hard to put this ban into debate if riot put it in their stand point and point out your wrong doings and doesn't look into the whole situation. i still stand with my vote on No. Because it happens to everyone and they do talk about it. Its riot not looking into the whole match on who is saying this or that, but the person who got reported. it sucks that they don't have another opinion or a stand point on these reports.
Thank you for saying that its almost like if they gave you the enitire chat log that a certain thing called *context* would also be a part of the debate
Socialize less. This is a competitive team game.

you dont get banned for afking. you get a leaverbuster. and only if you afk frequently.
i think there was ONE case on reddit where someone was afking in 500 games straight and thats why riot banned him. thats it.

I'll give it to you straight, this ban was unjust.

You should have just afked. As soon as he arrived in my lane with the intention of role stealing, I'd have dc'ed immediately. LeaveBuster is the least harsh of all penalties. I don't bother arguing anymore. I don't bother begging for surrenders when my team decide to run it down. I just leave. SoloQ is filled with braindead garbage and nothing can be gained by talking to them.
And as much as I hate afks in game, guess what? Riot trained you to afk because they have a terrible chat system.
Their punishment system is garbage. People should be punished for feeding, not talking shit. You should get like bans from ranked when you go 1-13 in games.

You're absolutely correct because in my experience someone going 1-13 or some other ridiculous number in ranked is almost always toxic as well. It's just as reasonable, if not more, as them banning you for saying 'wtf' or 'noob'.

right there with you. there banning makes no sense. the troll who steals a lane or feeds or goes afk doesn't seem to ever get banned. but if someone plays with friends and gets them to all report someone for anything, they can get someone banned.

Don't worry, I've been discussing the topic of an overzealous chat ban system all day here and I've been assured it's flawless. Anyone who gets banned for chat reasons is a toxic cretin who needs to leave league and no amount of terrible, toxic behavior game after game in league should ever result in human reactions. 

It's sad this game has come to this.

All league games should come to this took riot about 4 months to ban tyler1 permanently wen his IP address could have been found but 2 weeks for a guy who had a lil 14 days suspension?? BIG BRAIN RIOT
